our talent

Whatever the job brief, we have a degree-certified freelancer on hand to help.

What is Stiwdio agency

Here at the Stiwdio Agency, we seek to unite talented graduates with businesses in need. From video and film production, photography, infographics, web development, brand design, copywriting, sound engineering, and more, our degree-certified professionals are only a few clicks away.

Proudly powered by the Startup Stiwdio and the University of South Wales.

Entrepreneurs

University of South Wales graduates are prepared for tomorrow, ready to build their careers and make a difference.

Expertise

We understand the language of freelance and the language of business - we are here to help and guide both sides.

Excellence

High quality, successfully delivered projects and happy clients under our supervision

Stiwdio members

Our graduates live and breathe what they do, and have been trained on industry standard practices. They have been trained to degree level, they are USW certified and they have spent the last few years working to deadlines and project briefs.

Want the next generation to spread some innovation through your business? Out their skills to the test.
